siteMetadata.title: Product Hunt 热门
siteMetadata.author: Buzzing.cc
siteMetadata.description: 用中文浏览 Product Hunt 热门App，网站和产品

blogPost.excerpt: Lastbit Cards is a payment app for Europeans, featuring a MasterCard debit card that can be funded through instant Bitcoin transactions. Spend globally at online or physical stores and earn Bitcoin. Create burner cards for privacy and security.
blogPost.body: Lastbit Cards is a payment app for Europeans, featuring a MasterCard debit card that can be funded through instant Bitcoin transactions. Spend globally at online or physical stores and earn Bitcoin. Create burner cards for privacy and security.
blogPost.title: Lastbit Cards - A card to spend and earn Bitcoin for Europeans
blogPost.author: Michael Seibel

localize.description: Lastbit Cards是一款专为欧洲人设计的支付应用，特色是万事达借记卡，可以通过比特币交易即时充值。在全球范围内的在线或实体店消费，赚取比特币。创建烧钱卡，保证隐私和安全。
localize.tagline: 欧洲人消费赚取比特币的卡。

localize.description: Lastbit Cards是一款專爲歐洲人設計的支付應用，特色是萬事達借記卡，可以通過比特幣交易即時充值。在全球範圍內的在線或實體店消費，賺取比特幣。創建燒錢卡，保證隱私和安全。
localize.tagline: 歐洲人消費賺取比特幣的卡。

previous.excerpt: Friday is an asynchronous platform that helps accelerate the transition to working from anywhere. Roadmap your day, stay in sync with your team, and stay connected without another meeting.
previous.title: Friday 2.0 - Async operating system for remote work

localize.description: Friday是一个异步平台，可以帮助你加速过渡到在任何地方工作。为您的一天制定路线图，与您的团队保持同步，并在没有其他会议的情况下保持联系。
localize.tagline: 远程工作的异步操作系统

localize.description: Friday是一個異步平臺，可以幫助你加速過渡到在任何地方工作。爲您的一天制定路線圖，與您的團隊保持同步，並在沒有其他會議的情況下保持聯繫。
localize.tagline: 遠程工作的異步操作系統

next.excerpt: Acumen is the secret weapon dev teams use to deliver high-quality software on time. The platform unifies and analyzes engineering data to create a high-res picture of the team’s activities and recommends steps to avoid risks and boost productivity.
next.title: Acumen - GPS for software engineering teams

localize.description: Acumen是开发团队按时交付高质量软件的秘密武器。该平台统一并分析工程数据，以创建团队活动的高分辨率图像，并推荐避免风险和提高生产力的步骤。
Acumen是開發團隊按時交付高質量軟件的祕密武器。該平臺統一併分析工程數據，以創建團隊活動的高分辨率圖像，並推薦避免風險和提高生產力的步驟。
